p: The yield of oil obtained of Barringtonia asiatica was 0.8%. It was the first time oil is being extracted from these plant parts. The gas chromatography-flame ionization detection (GC-FID) of the leaf essential oil of Barringtonia asiatica recorded the presence of 14 components. In these studies, the major components of the phytochemicals were uncineol 30.9%, eicosane 27.4%, eicosane 21.6%, and 4-propyl-guaiacol 14.05%.
